description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Theory of the Earth, with proofs and illustrations. In four parts. By James Hutton. Vol. iii. Edited by Sir Archibald Geikie. [Vol. 1, 2 were published in 1795. This is a portion of the third volume, now first printed from the MS. in the possession of the Geological Society. With indexes to this portion and also to vol. 1, 2 by Sir A. Geikie.]" Contributor: GEIKIE, Archibald - Sir, K.C.B Contributor: HUTTON, James - F.R.S.E Author: Geological Society of London Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 07108.h.18." Page: 245 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1899 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002229753 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
